sentences.en: After he toes disembark from Weikeluo, place's indignant gentile purpose breaks him dead with stone.
sentences.cn: 他从威克洛上岸后, 当地愤怒的异教徒企图用石头将他砸死.

sentences.en: Bullshit, you oneself also saw , they to disembark occasionally! They also to disembark occasionally!
sentences.cn: 胡说, 您自己也看见了, 它们有时候也上岸!

sentences.en: I looked toward the plane. Six passengers had already disembarked.
sentences.cn: 我向飞机看去。6名乘客已下机。

sentences.en: I order to pull in to shore. All disembark.
sentences.cn: 我命令靠岸, 全体下船.

sentences.en: Macao altogether has 28 banks, including 3 disembark banks.
sentences.cn: 澳门共有28家银行, 包括3家离岸银行.

sentences.en: Numerous fairy people gallop to disembark.
Passengers are kindly requested to disembark from the front exit.
Seven second-class passengers prepared to disembark.
Slowly the ship moored, and people began to disembark.
sentences.cn: 船徐徐停住, 便有许多人上岸去.

sentences.en: Terry is on the bus but he doesn't know where to disembark. He asks the driver.
sentences.cn: 泰瑞正坐在一部公车上,但他不知道该在哪里下车. 他问了司机.

sentences.en: The plane has stopped completely, please disembark from the front ( middle, rear ) entry door.
sentences.cn: 本架飞机已经完全停稳(由于停靠廊桥), 请您从前 ( 中, 后 ) 登机门下飞机.

sentences.en: The ramp has just been put in its position. Now you can get your belongings and disembark.
sentences.cn: 舷梯已经放好. 现在您可以拿着行李下飞机了.

sentences.en: We should disembark from the right exit.
sentences.cn: 我们应该从右边出口下船.

sentences.en: We'll to stay here overnight. Please take your belongings and to disembark.
sentences.cn: 我们将在这里过夜, 请拿好随身物品预备下飞机.

sentences.en: What used to be an exit ramp is now a boat ramp to disembark survivors.
sentences.cn: 以前的出口坡道现在变成了船用斜坡道,给幸存者登岸用.

sentences.en: When we arrive at the gate, we'll start to disembark.
sentences.cn: 我们到达登机门的时候就开始让旅客下机.

trans.tran_en: to get off a ship or aircraft
